message.content:
I have attached a PDF export of my LinkedIn profile. Please analyze this PDF and create a minimal yet Gen-Z inspired personal homepage that doubles as a portfolio project.

**Focus: Highlight certifications along with experiences, projects, and skills  showing not just the certificates earned, but also what each certification adds to my capabilities and how it enhances my professional value.**

Key Requirements:

**Technology Stack** - Use only HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript (no frameworks/libraries). Must be standalone and fast-loading.

**Design Style** - Minimal, clean, and professional with a Gen-Z vibe  bold illustrations, smooth transitions, playful but polished animations.
First fold (above the fold) should contain the most important information (name, title, certifications, intro).
Responsive and accessible across devices.
Content Extraction
Parse relevant data from the LinkedIn PDF: name, headline, certifications, experience, skills, education.

**For each certification, include:**

Certification title
Issuing authority
Short note on what it brings to the table (e.g., Proves advanced ML knowledge with deployment skills).

**Randomized Design Elements**
Add creative randomness at build time by selecting from:

**Color Schemes:** Dark Mode (black/gray/white), Blue Tech (navy/cyan/white), Warm Professional (cream/orange/brown), Minimalist Green (sage/white/charcoal)

**Layout Style:** Left-aligned hero, Centered layout, Split-screen design, Card-based sections

**Typography:** Modern sans-serif, Clean geometric fonts, or Serif headings + sans body

**Animation Style:** Subtle fade-ins, Gentle slide animations, Hover scaling effects, or Typewriter text effects

**Background Pattern:** Geometric, Gradient, Dotted, or Solid color

**Portfolio Projects (AI-focused)**

**AI Chatbot with Database Integration**  Real-time conversational AI linked with databases for customer engagement.

**AI Voice Assistant with Phone Support**  Voice-based AI support system reducing response times and automating queries.

**Autonomous AI Agent for Job Search**  AI that finds, filters, and applies to jobs, increasing application efficiency.

**Homepage Structure**

Hero Section  Name, headline/title, intro, and badges/previews of top certifications

About Section  2-3 sentence bio

Certifications Section  Highlight each cert + value it adds

Featured AI Projects  Showcasing 3 key AI projects

Skills Section  From LinkedIn + AI/ML skills

Contact Section  Clean form or mailto link

**Design Specifications**

Mobile-responsive, semantic HTML5

Smooth Gen-Z-style transitions + subtle hover animations

Modern typography (randomized choice)

Lightweight, no external dependencies

Certifications should visually pop (badges/illustrations/hover effects)

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Shyam Saha - Product Innovator</title>
    <style>
        :root {
            --primary: #1a1a2e;
            --secondary: #16213e;
            --accent: #0f3460;
            --highlight: #e94560;
            --text: #f5f5f5;
            --text-secondary: #b8b8b8;
            --gradient-1: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
            --gradient-2: linear-gradient(135deg, #f093fb 0%, #f5576c 100%);
            --gradient-3: linear-gradient(135deg, #4facfe 0%, #00f2fe 100%);
            --gradient-4: linear-gradient(135deg, #43e97b 0%, #38f9d7 100%);
        }

        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }

        body {
            font-family: 'Inter', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, sans-serif;
            background: var(--primary);
            color: var(--text);
            overflow-x: hidden;
            line-height: 1.6;
        }

        /* Floating Background Elements */
        .bg-pattern {
            position: fixed;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            z-index: -1;
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        .floating-shape {
            position: absolute;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background: var(--gradient-1);
            opacity: 0.1;
            animation: float 20s infinite ease-in-out;
        }

        .shape-1 {
            width: 300px;
            height: 300px;
            top: -150px;
            right: -100px;
            animation-delay: 0s;
        }

        .shape-2 {
            width: 200px;
            height: 200px;
            bottom: -100px;
            left: -50px;
            background: var(--gradient-2);
            animation-delay: 5s;
        }

        .shape-3 {
            width: 150px;
            height: 150px;
            top: 50%;
            right: 10%;
            background: var(--gradient-3);
            animation-delay: 10s;
        }

        @keyframes float {
            0%, 100% { transform: translate(0, 0) rotate(0deg); }
            33% { transform: translate(30px, -30px) rotate(120deg); }
            66% { transform: translate(-20px, 20px) rotate(240deg); }
        }

        /* Navigation */
        nav {
            position: fixed;
            top: 0;
            width: 100%;
            padding: 1rem 2rem;
            background: rgba(26, 26, 46, 0.95);
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            z-index: 1000;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        nav.scrolled {
            padding: 0.5rem 2rem;
            box-shadow: 0 5px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
        }

        .nav-container {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
        }

        .logo {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            font-weight: 800;
            background: var(--gradient-1);
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
            background-clip: text;
        }

        .nav-links {
            display: flex;
            gap: 2rem;
            list-style: none;
        }

        .nav-links a {
            color: var(--text);
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            position: relative;
        }

        .nav-links a::after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            bottom: -5px;
            left: 0;
            width: 0;
            height: 2px;
            background: var(--highlight);
            transition: width 0.3s ease;
        }

        .nav-links a:hover::after {
            width: 100%;
        }

        /* Hero Section */
        .hero {
            min-height: 100vh;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            padding: 2rem;
            position: relative;
        }

        .hero-content {
            max-width: 1200px;
            width: 100%;
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            gap: 4rem;
            align-items: center;
        }

        .hero-text h1 {

            top: 0;
            bottom: 0;
            left: 50%;
            margin-left: -2px;

            background-color: inherit;
            width: 50%;
            opacity: 0;
            transform: translateY(30px);
            transition: all 0.5s ease;

        .timeline-item.show {
            opacity: 1;
            transform: translateY(0);
        }

        .timeline-item::after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            width: 25px;
            height: 25px;
            right: -12.5px;
            background: var(--primary);
            border: 4px solid var(--highlight);
            top: 25px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            z-index: 1;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;

        .timeline-item:hover::after {
            transform: scale(1.3);
            background: var(--highlight);
        }

        .left {
            left: 0;
        }

        .right {
            left: 50%;
        }

        .left::before {
            content: "";
            height: 0;
            position: absolute;
            top: 30px;
            width: 0;
            z-index: 1;
            right: 30px;
            border: medium solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            border-width: 10px 0 10px 10px;
            border-color: transparent transparent transparent rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
        }

        .right::before {
            content: "";
            height: 0;
            position: absolute;
            top: 30px;
            width: 0;
            z-index: 1;
            left: 30px;
            border: medium solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            border-width: 10px 10px 10px 0;
            border-color: transparent rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) transparent transparent;

            left: -12.5px;

        /* Skills Section */
        .skills-container {

        }

        /* Contact Section */
        .contact {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 4rem 2rem;
        }

        .contact-buttons {
            display: flex;
            gap: 2rem;
            justify-content: center;
            margin-top: 2rem;
        }

        .btn {
            padding: 1rem 2rem;
            background: var(--gradient-1);
            border: none;
            border-radius: 30px;
            color: white;
            font-weight: 600;
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            cursor: pointer;
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 0.5rem;
        }

        .btn:hover {
            transform: translateY(-3px);
            box-shadow: 0 15px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
        }

        /* Animations */
        @keyframes slideInLeft {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateX(-50px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateX(0);
            }
        }

        @keyframes slideInRight {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateX(50px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateX(0);
            }
        }

        @keyframes fadeInUp {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(30px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }

        .fade-in {
            opacity: 0;
            animation: fadeInUp 0.8s ease forwards;
        }

        /* Responsive Design */
        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .nav-links {
                display: none;

            .hero-content {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
                text-align: center;

                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
                gap: 1.5rem;
            }

            .contact-buttons {
                flex-direction: column;
                align-items: center;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>

            'linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%)',
            'linear-gradient(135deg, #f093fb 0%, #f5576c 100%)',
            'linear-gradient(135deg, #4facfe 0%, #00f2fe 100%)',
            'linear-gradient(135deg, #43e97b 0%, #38f9d7 100%)'
        ];

        // Apply random color scheme
        const randomScheme = colorSchemes[Math.floor(Math.random() * colorSchemes.length)];
        const root = document.documentElement;
        Object.keys(randomScheme).forEach(key => {
            root.style.setProperty(`--${key}`, randomScheme[key]);
        });

        // Apply random gradients
        const randomGradient = () => gradients[Math.floor(Math.random() * gradients.length)];
        root.style.setProperty('--gradient-1', randomGradient());
        root.style.setProperty('--gradient-2', randomGradient());
        root.style.setProperty('--gradient-3', randomGradient());
        root.style.setProperty('--gradient-4', randomGradient());

        // Navbar scroll effect
        window.addEventListener('scroll', () => {
            const navbar = document.getElementById('navbar');
            if (window.scrollY > 50) {
                navbar.classList.add('scrolled');
            } else {
                navbar.classList.remove('scrolled');
            }
        });

        // Smooth scrolling for navigation links
        document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
            anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
                e.preventDefault();
                const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href'));
                if (target) {
                    target.scrollIntoView({
                        behavior: 'smooth',
                        block: 'start'
                    });
                }
            });
        });

        // Intersection Observer for fade-in animations
        const observerOptions = {
            threshold: 0.1,
            rootMargin: '0px 0px -50px 0px'
        };

        const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
            entries.forEach(entry => {
                if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                    entry.target.style.animationDelay = Math.random() * 0.3 + 's';
                    entry.target.classList.add('animated');
                }
            });
        }, observerOptions);

        document.querySelectorAll('.fade-in').forEach(el => {
            observer.observe(el);
        });

        // Typewriter effect for hero title
        const heroTitle = document.querySelector('.hero-text h1');
        const originalText = heroTitle.innerHTML;
        heroTitle.innerHTML = '';
        let i = 0;

        function typeWriter() {
            if (i < originalText.length) {
                heroTitle.innerHTML = originalText.slice(0, i + 1);
                i++;
                setTimeout(typeWriter, 50);
            }
        }

        setTimeout(typeWriter, 500);

        // Parallax effect for floating shapes
        document.addEventListener('mousemove', (e) => {
            const shapes = document.querySelectorAll('.floating-shape');
            const x = e.clientX / window.innerWidth;
            const y = e.clientY / window.innerHeight;

            shapes.forEach((shape, index) => {
                const speed = (index + 1) * 20;
                shape.style.transform = `translate(${x * speed}px, ${y * speed}px)`;
            });
        });

        // Dynamic year in stats
        const currentYear = new Date().getFullYear();
        const startYear = 2009;
        const yearsExperience = currentYear - startYear;
        document.querySelector('.stat-number').textContent = `${yearsExperience}+`;

        // Add hover sound effect (optional - works only if user has interacted with page)
        const addHoverSound = () => {
            const audioContext = new (window.AudioContext || window.webkitAudioContext)();
            
            document.querySelectorAll('.cert-badge, .skill-item, .btn').forEach(el => {
                el.addEventListener('mouseenter', () => {
                    const oscillator = audioContext.createOscillator();
                    const gainNode = audioContext.createGain();
                    
                    oscillator.connect(gainNode);
                    gainNode.connect(audioContext.destination);
                    
                    oscillator.frequency.value = 800;
                    oscillator.type = 'sine';
                    gainNode.gain.value = 0.1;
                    
                    oscillator.start();
                    oscillator.stop(audioContext.currentTime + 0.05);
                });
            });
        };

        // Initialize hover sound on first user interaction
        document.addEventListener('click', addHoverSound, { once: true });

        // Console Easter Egg
        console.log('%c Welcome to Shyam\'s Portfolio! ', 'font-size: 20px; color: #4facfe; font-weight: bold;');
        console.log('%c Built with  and vanilla JS', 'font-size: 14px; color: #667eea;');
    </script>
</body>
</html>

</head>

    <script>
        // Randomization on page load
        const colorSchemes = [
            {
                primary: '#1a1a2e',
                secondary: '#16213e',
                accent: '#0f3460',
                highlight: '#e94560'
            },
            {
                primary: '#0a0e27',
                secondary: '#151a3c',
                accent: '#2d3561',
                highlight: '#00d9ff'
            },
            {
                primary: '#2d2d2d',
                secondary: '#3d3d3d',
                accent: '#4d4d4d',
                highlight: '#ff6b6b'
            },
            {
                primary: '#1a1f2e',
                secondary: '#2a3444',
                accent: '#3a495a',
                highlight: '#4fb06d'
            }
        ];

        const animations = ['fadeInUp', 'slideInLeft', 'slideInRight'];
        const gradients = [
            'linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%)',
            'linear-gradient(135deg, #f093fb 0%, #f5576c 100%)',
            'linear-gradient(135deg, #4facfe 0%, #00f2fe 100%)',
            'linear-gradient(135deg, #43e97b 0%, #38f9d7 100%)'
        ];

        // Apply random color scheme
        const randomScheme = colorSchemes[Math.floor(Math.random() * colorSchemes.length)];
        const root = document.documentElement;
        Object.keys(randomScheme).forEach(key => {
            root.style.setProperty(`--${key}`, randomScheme[key]);
        });

        // Apply random gradients
        const randomGradient = () => gradients[Math.floor(Math.random() * gradients.length)];
        root.style.setProperty('--gradient-1', randomGradient());
        root.style.setProperty('--gradient-2', randomGradient());
        root.style.setProperty('--gradient-3', randomGradient());
        root.style.setProperty('--gradient-4', randomGradient());

        // Navbar scroll effect
        window.addEventListener('scroll', () => {
            const navbar = document.getElementById('navbar');
            if (window.scrollY > 50) {
                navbar.classList.add('scrolled');
            } else {
                navbar.classList.remove('scrolled');
            }
        });

        // Smooth scrolling for navigation links
        document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
            anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
                e.preventDefault();
                const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href'));
                if (target) {
                    target.scrollIntoView({
                        behavior: 'smooth',
                        block: 'start'
                    });
                }
            });
        });

        // Intersection Observer for fade-in animations
        const observerOptions = {
            threshold: 0.1,
            rootMargin: '0px 0px -50px 0px'
        };

        const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
            entries.forEach(entry => {
                if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                    entry.target.style.animationDelay = Math.random() * 0.3 + 's';
                    entry.target.classList.add('animated');
                }
            });
        }, observerOptions);

        document.querySelectorAll('.fade-in').forEach(el => {
            observer.observe(el);
        });

        // Typewriter effect for hero title
        const heroTitle = document.querySelector('.hero-text h1');
        const originalText = heroTitle.innerHTML;
        heroTitle.innerHTML = '';
        let i = 0;

        function typeWriter() {
            if (i < originalText.length) {
                heroTitle.innerHTML = originalText.slice(0, i + 1);
                i++;
                setTimeout(typeWriter, 50);
            }
        }

        setTimeout(typeWriter, 500);

        // Parallax effect for floating shapes
        document.addEventListener('mousemove', (e) => {
            const shapes = document.querySelectorAll('.floating-shape');
            const x = e.clientX / window.innerWidth;
            const y = e.clientY / window.innerHeight;

            shapes.forEach((shape, index) => {
                const speed = (index + 1) * 20;
                shape.style.transform = `translate(${x * speed}px, ${y * speed}px)`;
            });
        });

        // Dynamic year in stats
        const currentYear = new Date().getFullYear();
        const startYear = 2009;
        const yearsExperience = currentYear - startYear;
        document.querySelector('.stat-number').textContent = `${yearsExperience}+`;

        // Add hover sound effect (optional - works only if user has interacted with page)
        const addHoverSound = () => {
            const audioContext = new (window.AudioContext || window.webkitAudioContext)();
            
            document.querySelectorAll('.cert-badge, .skill-item, .btn').forEach(el => {
                el.addEventListener('mouseenter', () => {
                    const oscillator = audioContext.createOscillator();
                    const gainNode = audioContext.createGain();
                    
                    oscillator.connect(gainNode);
                    gainNode.connect(audioContext.destination);
                    
                    oscillator.frequency.value = 800;
                    oscillator.type = 'sine';
                    gainNode.gain.value = 0.1;
                    
                    oscillator.start();
                    oscillator.stop(audioContext.currentTime + 0.05);
                });
            });
        };

        // Initialize hover sound on first user interaction
        document.addEventListener('click', addHoverSound, { once: true });

        // Console Easter Egg
        console.log('%c Welcome to Shyam\'s Portfolio! ', 'font-size: 20px; color: #4facfe; font-weight: bold;');
        console.log('%c Built with  and vanilla JS', 'font-size: 14px; color: #667eea;');
    </script>
</body>
</html>

content.text:
Perfect! I've successfully added an interactive timeline section to your portfolio that showcases your work experience journey. Here's what I've implemented:

##  New Timeline Features:

**Visual Design:**
- **Vertical timeline** with a gradient line connecting all experiences
- **Alternating left/right layout** for desktop (zigzag pattern)
- **Animated timeline nodes** that scale on hover
- **Year badges** with gradient backgrounds
- **Glass-morphism cards** with backdrop blur effects

**Interactive Elements:**
- **Scroll-triggered animations** - timeline items fade in as you scroll
- **Staggered animations** for a smooth cascading effect
- **Hover effects** on timeline cards that scale and glow
- **Pulsing timeline nodes** on hover

**Content Structure for Each Role:**
- Job title with gradient text effect
- Company name and location
- Duration with icons
- Key achievements with sparkle bullets
- Technology/domain tags

**Responsive Design:**
- On mobile, timeline shifts to single column
- Timeline line moves to the left side
- Cards stack vertically for easy reading
- Touch-friendly interaction areas

**Key Highlights from Your Experience:**
- **Novatr (Current)** - Leading EdTech innovation
- **SHL** - $6M ARR achievement, 220K interviews managed
- **Oswaal Books** - 75K+ subscriber growth in 3 months
- **Finitiatives** - 11 years building platform serving 2M+ users

The timeline seamlessly integrates with your existing portfolio design, maintaining the Gen-Z aesthetic with smooth animations and modern glass-morphism effects. The experience section now sits between your hero section and certifications, creating a natural flow through your professional journey.

Open the updated `portfolio.html` to see your complete portfolio with the new interactive timeline showcasing your impressive career progression!
